title: Weekly Housing - NO DEPOSIT, NO LEASE, Includes Utilities, Furnished
posting_body: ['The Avondale Hotel is a residential hotel located in a quiet neighborhood offering weekly rentals of fully furnished rooms STARTING at $250 per week plus tax (for a room with no bath or sink) for one person or $70 per night plus tax AND UP.', 'We have rooms with shared bathrooms, private bathsrooms, and/or kitchenettes.', 'Your room rental includes:', '- On site management', '- Cable TV (including 3 channels of HBO)', '- Utilities: Electricity, Gas, Water and Garbage', '- Fully furnished rooms', '- Easy access to public transportation and Pill Hill', '*complimentary wi-fi internet is also provided as an amenity to guests, but not considered to be part of the room rate.', '*Images on this post may not be the same as the room available.', 'All rooms are slightly different', 'We rent rooms on a weekly basis, and therefore do not require a security deposit, lease agreement or credit check.', 'A valid government issued ID is required.', 'Please call', 'show contact info', 'or visit us for more information between 7 AM and 10 PM at 540 28th Street (off of Telegraph) in Oakland.', 'Please check daily as our inventory of available rooms changes often.', 'No reservations are accepted and rooms are rented on a first come first serve basis.']
